long_description: Add something fun and feminine to your running wardrobe. The Salomon Park Twinskin Skort offers comfort plus coverage so you can show off your stride and your sense of style at the same time. Inner boy-shorts and polyester skirt wick moisture away from skin and dry quickly; built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful UV rays. Wide, comfortable waistband includes internal drawcord for a perfect fit; hidden zip pocket stows a key, credit card or energy gel. Salomon Park Twinskin Skort features reflective details for increased visibility in low light.
short_description: Add something fun and feminine to your running wardrobe. The Salomon Park Twinskin Skort offers comfort plus coverage so you can show off your stride and your sense of style at the same time.
